evidence.claim: CGFNS utilizes HL7 standards for health information exchange in their services.
CGFNS complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure the privacy and security of health information.
CGFNS processes X12 EDI transactions for credential evaluation services.
CGFNS adopts FHIR standards for modern healthcare applications.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of engaging in X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities.
